description: Playing games like Ludo is fun as it can be quite an unpredictable game. At a glance, Ludo might seem to be one of the easiest board games. Taking four pieces from the start point to the finish, how hard could that be? But just like any game, there are much more intricacies in the Ludo board game, knowing which will help a player get better at the game. From strategically placing your pieces to moving them according to the pace of the game, several Ludo tips can be helpful for players to win Ludo online on vpl.

One of the most important Ludo tips is to get all pieces out of the starting point as early as possible. New players tend to focus on moving one piece at a time, and if that piece reaches the finishing point, they are left with no option but to wait for 6s to get their game back on track.

An extension of the previous Ludo tip, a player’s focus should not be on moving only one piece at a time as it leaves fewer options while moving the pieces. It is advised to spread your pieces across the board. This gives the player multiple options to play during a turn and also helps avoid unnecessary risks.

Having your piece occupy the same space on the square as the opponent’s piece will send the latter back in the starting zone. This means the opponent will need to score another 6 or 1 to get the piece out of the starting point. This can be done anywhere on the board except the safe zone and the respective coloured finishing areas.

While cutting an opponent's pieces is an important Ludo tactic, it should be used after careful examination of the rest of the pieces on the board. For instance, it would not make any sense to cut someone’s piece close to your finishing area, only to have your piece killed by a different piece of one of your opponents.
A general rule of thumb is to avoid taking risks with your pieces if they are closer to the end zone, i.e., the third and fourth quadrant of the board.

This is one of the most important tips to win ludo online games. Even if you choose to kill a player in the first or the second quadrant, this should be done after carefully plotting an escape plan. An escape means that your piece should be at least seven spaces away from your opponent’s pieces. Your opponent can still kill your piece if they score a 6 and make it to your space on the second turn. But the probability of this happening is relatively low.

Amongst the ludo tips and tricks, it is important to place your pieces in such a manner that it becomes hard for your opponent to navigate through the board. The eight available safe zones can be used to strategically place your pieces in various combinations, which increases the probability of your opponent’s pieces being cut. Slowing down your opponent is as important as being the fastest to move all four into the finish area.

Capturing the opponent’s pieces is exciting. However, it only helps to clear the path for your pieces but doesn’t guarantee a win. To win in Ludo online, you must be the first to move all your pieces to the end zone. This becomes difficult if a player is reckless with their pieces close to the home area.

You can minimize the risks associated with your pieces near the home area by keeping them in the safe zone. When the piece is at the second last safe zone (the final enemy territory), it is advisable to move it when you score a 6, as it will almost negate the risk of being cut. Following the same strategy, at the last safe zone, moving the piece at 4 or higher will take it straight into your coloured territory.

description: In Ludo, the game is not over when you reach the home area. While your piece will be safe, it still needs to enter the end zone. As soon as one of the pieces enters the home area, moving it into the end zone is better. Too many pieces hovering in the home area could leave you hunting for specific numbers. This could potentially allow the opponent to sneak away with a win.These are just some basic strategies that can help any player bag some wins while playing Ludo on vpl. It is important to understand how to play Ludo as it will not only help you win the game but also let you enjoy it to the fullest.
